# Test: grove exec handles exit codes correctly
setup_workspace feature bugfix

exec grove add feature
exec grove add bugfix

# Successful command shows success message
exec grove exec --all -- true
stderr 'Executed'

# Failed command continues by default and shows failure count
! exec grove exec --all -- false
stderr 'failed'

# --fail-fast stops on first failure
! exec grove exec --all --fail-fast -- false
stderr 'failed'
